product_name: One Ball Jay F-1 All-Temp Hot /Rub-On Wax
long_description: The One Ball Jay F-1 All-Temp Hot/Rub-On wax can be used with a hot iron, or rubbed on the base of your snowboard for a quick boost in speed. Hydrocarbon blend features an additive for increased speed. All-temperature formula makes this wax a great choice no matter the conditions.
short_description: The One Ball Jay F-1 All-Temp Hot/Rub-On wax can be used with a hot iron, or rubbed on the base of your snowboard for a quick boost in speed.
